overview: There's a reason Kendra Lust won AVN's Hottest MILF award three years in a row, not to mention AVN's MILF Performer of the Year two years in a row! She's got that magic combination of smokin' hot body, unforgettable face an insatiable performances! That's why ZT has put together this best-of release with two bursting-full discs of her hottest scenes that steam up the screen with her incredible talents. Fans know best why Everybody Loves Kendra Lust!
title: Everybody Loves Kendra Lust
